name: Joey the Snowman
description:
Help Joey the Snowman to keep himself cool and have a great white christmas!

The rules are simple:

- Collect as many snowflakes as you can to keep the temperature low.
- You will find useful tools or bonus points in the gift boxes.
- Avoid icicles unless you have a scarf.
- Sledge will make you faster.
- Broom will blow the snowflakes to you.

Share your personal high score on the Game Center leaderboard!

Graphics has been drawn by my 12 years old son on his iPad. Please welcome aboard the next generation of game developers. We hope you will enjoy playing the game as much as we enjoyed making it.

Joey the Snowman is a universal app running on the iPhone, iPod touch and iPad. It supports retina display and iPhone 5 widescreen.
